original_text: And her husband heard it, and held his peace at her in the day that he heard it: then her vows shall stand, and her bonds wherewith she bound her soul shall stand.
korean_text: 그의 남편이 그것을 듣고 그 듣는 날에 그에게 아무 말이 없으면 그 서원을 이행할 것이요 그가 결심한 서약을 지킬 것이니라

sentences.original_text: and held his peace at her
in the day that he heard it:
and her bonds wherewith she bound her soul
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 자신의 영혼을 매었던 그녀의 속박들도
